news.title: Obamacare subsidies extension to get vote after 4 Republicans buck leadership
news.description: Millions of Americans will face much higher health insurance premiums in 2026 if Congress does not extend boosted subsidies for Obamacare plans.

news.title: FCC chief Brendan Carr tells Senate that his agency is 'not formally ... independent'
news.description: FCC chairman Brendan Carr testified to a congressional committee for the first time since ABC suspended Jimmy Kimmel's show following a Carr threat.

news.title: Oracle stock dips 5% on report Blue Owl Capital won't back $10 billion data center
news.description: The cloud company later said the project was moving forward and "on schedule," but that Blue Owl was not part of equity talks.
